title: 旧约 - 诗篇(Psalms) - 第 124 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 诗篇(Psalms) -- 第 124 章 ( 本篇共有 150 章 )

lineList.en: If it had not been the LORD who was on our side, now may Israel say;
lineList.cn: （大卫上行之诗）以色列人要说，若不是耶和华帮助我们，

lineList.en: If it had not been the LORD who was on our side, when men rose up against us:
lineList.cn: 若不是耶和华帮助我们，当人起来攻击我们，

lineList.en: Then they had swallowed us up quick, when their wrath was kindled against us:
lineList.cn: 向我们发怒的时候，就把我们活活地吞了。

lineList.en: Then the waters had overwhelmed us, the stream had gone over our soul:
lineList.cn: 那时，波涛必漫过我们，河水必淹没我们。

lineList.en: Then the proud waters had gone over our soul.
Blessed be the LORD, who hath not given us as a prey to their teeth.
lineList.cn: 耶和华是应当称颂的。他没有把我们当野食交给他们吞吃（原文作牙齿）。

lineList.en: Our soul is escaped as a bird out of the snare of the fowlers: the snare is broken, and we are escaped.
lineList.cn: 我们好像雀鸟，从捕鸟人的网罗里逃脱。网罗破裂，我们逃脱了。

lineList.en: Our help is in the name of the LORD, who made heaven and earth.
lineList.cn: 我们得帮助，是在乎倚靠造天地之耶和华的名。
